blogs.title: Update on Testosterone Supplementation
blogs.summary: Testosterone supplementation is a legitimate treatment for properly-diagnosed androgen deficiency, but it is being overprescribed by doctors who make exaggerated claims for it. New evidence clarifies its modest benefits and worrisome risks.

news.title: Testosterone therapy improves sexual interest, function in older men
news.summary: Washington, DC--Older men with low libido and low testosterone levels showed more interest in sex and engaged in more sexual activity when they underwent testosterone therapy, according to a new study published in the Endocrine Society's Journal of…
